author: cziegeler
msg: Set the content-length of a response when the pipeline buffers the content

author: djd
msg: Pass system properties for DataSOurce connections (ij.dataSource*) from
RunSuite into the VM invoked for RunTest. Allows suites to be run successfully
using a DataSource to obtain connections.

author: djd
msg: When ij obtains its initial connection using a data source (ij.dataSource)
use DataSource.getConnection(user, password) if ij.user is set.
